name: Football High School Juggling!
description:
You run while lifting a soccer ball.
Compete the distance you ran.
The operation is simple, I will do the lifting tap.

---------------------

20XX year, middle of transcendence soccer boom,

Was here girls can not play soccer ...


One day, A girl, a soccer ball that has rolled to his feet

From the fact that it was kicked back, this club was supposed to start.


However, far, far, and far more than anyone else a soccer ball ...


Battle of lifting hot girls who reach the top of the world lifting unfolds now! !

4s, 5,5 s, 5c
